Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Clickable
        • Player
  • public class Player
extends Clickable
    A player in this simulation, of which there are two.

    Adjustable properties:

    • Clicks per second
    • Number of clickers
    • Number of starting grandmas

    "AI" behaviour:

    • If it has enough cookies to buy the cookie rocket, it shall do so immediately
    • Default state: choose a random point on the cookie and click there
    • Every 2-5 clicks, it shall attempt to perform a random action:
      • Click on a random clickable building
      • Buy a random building
      • Buy a random powerup
      • Buy a random sabotage
      Version:
      November 2022
      Author:
      Eddie Zhuang

      • Constructor Detail

        • Player

          public Player​(int width,
              int height,
              int clickers,
              int speed,
              int grandmas,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String colour)
          Parameters:
          width - The width all the player's stuff will take up (rows, cookie, counter text, etc.)
          height - The width all the player's stuff will take up (rows, cookie, counter text, etc.)
          clickers - How many clickers the player will start off with
          speed - The speed of the clicker
          grandmas - Number of starting grandmas
          name - The name of the player, for text displays. Example: "Player 1"
          isRed - Whether the player is red or not (blue)

          public void changeCookieCount​(int x)
